title_en: Bambusa Aerodance Wins at Tamu Gadang 2023
summary_en: SK Bebuloh's Bambusa Aerodance team emerged as champions at the 2023 Tamu Gadang Aerodance Challenge, Labuan.
summary_ms: Pasukan Bambusa Aerodance SK Bebuloh dinobatkan sebagai juara dalam Pertandingan Aerodance Tamu Gadang 2023, Labuan.

title_ms: Pertandingan Koir Merdeka 2025 di Dewan Bambusa
summary_en: SK Bebuloh hosted the Labuan Merdeka Choir Competition at Dewan Bambusa, celebrating unity through song.
summary_ms: SK Bebuloh menjadi tuan rumah Pertandingan Koir Merdeka Labuan di Dewan Bambusa yang baharu.
